sourcesContent:
We use cookies to enhance your experience. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'photographer-website'; showCookieConsent = true; ngOnInit(): void { // Check if user has already made a cookie choice const cookieChoice = localStorage.getItem('cookieChoice'); if (cookieChoice) { this.showCookieConsent = false; } } acceptCookies(): void { localStorage.setItem('cookieChoice', 'accepted'); this.showCookieConsent = false; } declineCookies(): void { localStorage.setItem('cookieChoice', 'declined'); this.showCookieConsent = false; } }
